Package com.irurueta.geometry.io

Class MeshWriter.Listeners

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.geometry.io.MeshWriter.Listeners
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoaderListener, LoaderListenerBinary, LoaderListenerOBJ, MaterialLoaderListener
Enclosing class:
MeshWriter
private class MeshWriter.Listeners extends Object implements LoaderListener, LoaderListenerOBJ, LoaderListenerBinary, MaterialLoaderListener
Internal class implementing listeners for different specific loaders.

      public void onLoadProgressChange(Loader loader, float progress)
      Method called when loading progress changes enough to be notified.
      Specified by:
      onLoadProgressChange in interface LoaderListener
      Parameters:
      loader - reference to loader.
      progress - progress amount as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

    • onMaterialLoaderRequested

      public MaterialLoaderOBJ onMaterialLoaderRequested(LoaderOBJ loader, String path)
      Called when an OBJ loader requires a material loader to load the associated material (MTL) file.
      Specified by:
      onMaterialLoaderRequested in interface LoaderListenerOBJ
      Parameters:
      loader - reference to loader.
      path - path where MTL file should be found. It's up to the final implementation to determine where the file will be finally found.
      Returns:
      an instance of a material loader.

    • onTextureReceived

      public File onTextureReceived(LoaderBinary loader, int textureId, int textureImageWidth, int textureImageHeight)
      Called when a texture has been found.
      Specified by:
      onTextureReceived in interface LoaderListenerBinary
      Parameters:
      loader - reference to loader.
      textureId - id assigned to the texture that has been found.
      textureImageWidth - width of texture image that has been found.
      textureImageHeight - height of texture image that has been found.
      Returns:
      File where texture data will be copied to.

    • onTextureDataAvailable

      public boolean onTextureDataAvailable(LoaderBinary loader, File textureFile, int textureId, int textureImageWidth, int textureImageHeight)
      Called when texture data is available to be retrieved.
      Specified by:
      onTextureDataAvailable in interface LoaderListenerBinary
      Parameters:
      loader - reference to loader.
      textureFile - reference to a File where texture data has been temporarily copied.
      textureId - id assigned to the texture.
      textureImageWidth - width of texture image.
      textureImageHeight - height of texture image.
      Returns:
      converted image trans-coded into JPG format or resized if needed, or input textureFile if no changes are needed.
      See Also:
      • LoaderListenerBinary.onTextureReceived(LoaderBinary, int, int, int)

    • onValidateTexture

      public boolean onValidateTexture(MaterialLoader loader, Texture texture)
      Called when a texture assigned to a material must be validated to ensure that texture is valid.
      Specified by:
      onValidateTexture in interface MaterialLoaderListener
      Parameters:
      loader - reference to loader.
      texture - texture reference to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if texture is valid, false otherwise.
